text: Alistair Browning (8 February 1954 â€“ 2 June 2019) was a New Zealand actor. He was born in Dunedin. He most notably played the role of Damrod in Peter Jackson's The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (2002) and The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (2003). He won Best Supporting Actor in a Feature Film at the 2001 New Zealand Film and Television Awards for his role in Rain. He also had TV roles in series such as Power Rangers Ninja Storm, Power Rangers Dino Thunder and Shortland Street. Browning died of cancer on 2 June 2019 in Palmerston North. He was 65. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in New Zealand Category:New Zealand movie actors Category:New Zealand stage actors Category:New Zealand television actors Category:New Zealand voice actors Category:People from Dunedin
title: Alistair Browning
